project_context.responsibility: Review drawings from design contractors, suppliers, and construction contractors

review_objectives: Identify non-conformances with applicable codes and standards
Apply engineering judgment and best practices
Provide actionable comments for successful project delivery

comment_requirements.references: Must cite specific codes, standards, or specifications

table_columns: page - Page number where issue is found
issue - Description of non-conformance with reference to requirement
criticality - High/Medium/Low based on impact to project delivery

criticality_definitions.High: Non-compliance with mandatory codes/standards, safety hazard, prevents approval or energization
criticality_definitions.Medium: Missing required information, incorrect methodology, affects coordination or commissioning
criticality_definitions.Low: Documentation clarity, minor omissions, best practice recommendations
